backend/main.mo: Defines game rule types and preset rules for Skyjo, Mille Bornes, Nerts, and Flip 7 plus game session and player profile field types.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking Flip 7 toggle‑UI requirements to the affected frontend file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files including hooks, screens, components, and scoring utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables and dark‑mode tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, and profile‑setup gating based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time user profile creation, saving the name through the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with header navigation, mobile menu, login button, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/scores/Flip7Scor: UI for Flip 7 round scoring with selectable cards, manual input, optional x2 multiplier, and final score calculation per player.
frontend/src/components/scores/MilleBorn: Form for Mille Bornes scoring that tracks distance and bonuses, calculates totals, and submits per‑player scores.
frontend/src/components/scores/NertsScor: Nerts scoring input that computes each player’s score from center cards and tableau cards with validation.
frontend/src/components/scores/RoundsTab: Displays all rounds in a table and allows editing round scores via a dialog.
frontend/src/components/scores/SkyjoScor: Simple per‑player numeric score input for Skyjo rounds with validation before submission.
frontend/src/gameTemplates.ts: Defines game templates for Skyjo, Mille Bornes, Nerts, and Flip7 and provides factory functions to create and look up game types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current authenticated user's profile using the actor and exposes loading/authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameSessions.ts: Provides queries and mutations for listing, retrieving, creating game sessions, and adding rounds via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login/logout methods, and status through context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfiles.ts: Fetches, creates, and retrieves player profiles using actor-backed queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and styling.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Calculates player totals, rankings, and checks game end conditions based on scoring rules.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for session players, rounds, and local game session structure.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/screens/GamePickerScreen.ts: Displays available game types and navigates to setup when a user selects a game.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Shows authenticated users their sorted game history with navigation to individual sessions.
frontend/src/screens/ProfilesScreen.tsx: UI screen for viewing, creating, and listing player profiles, with authentication checks and profile creation form.
frontend/src/screens/ScoreSheetScreen.ts: Loads a game session, manages rounds and scoring, and displays score entry components based on game type.
Handles setup of a new game session, including selecting saved profiles or adding quick players and configuring game-specific options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing feature requirements, known issues, and state for Flip 7 card toggle updates.
